Gatherer:Centralize.NAME: Centralize
Gatherer:Centralize.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL gatherer:Twice: Upgrade !M! random cards in hand; Fetched cards get priority.
NL gatherer:Once: Upgrade !M! random cards in hand; Fetched cards get priority.

Gatherer:SpareBottle.NAME: Spare Bottle
Gatherer:SpareBottle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

Gatherer:AcidicSpray.NAME: Acidic Spray
Gatherer:AcidicSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the target. Apply !M! Weak.

Gatherer:BambuSword.NAME: Bambu Sword
Gatherer:BambuSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play a []Strike or Defend from your hand with no cost.

Gatherer:CarefulStrike.NAME: Careful Strike
Gatherer:CarefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put up to !M! card on top of your draw pile.

Gatherer:CollectorsShot.NAME: Collector's Shot
Gatherer:CollectorsShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 1.5 times the number of gatherer:Unique cards with no duplicates in your deck.
Gatherer:CollectorsShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of gatherer:Unique cards with no duplicates in your deck.

Gatherer:DrugPower.NAME: Drug Power
Gatherer:DrugPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you used a Potion this turn, gain the effect of the last used Potion.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Huh? Fruit Juice isn't delicious any more!

Gatherer:FlowerFalling.NAME: Flower Falling
Gatherer:FlowerFalling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
Gatherer:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

Gatherer:FragileHammer.NAME: Fragile Hammer
Gatherer:FragileHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M! damage to a random enemy other than the target.

Gatherer:ScherryThrow.NAME: Scherry Throw
Gatherer:ScherryThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E].

Gatherer:Snatch.NAME: Snatch
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL gatherer:Twice: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.
NL gatherer:Once: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

Gatherer:TacticalStrike.NAME: Tactical Strike
Gatherer:TacticalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !M! Strength until end of turn.

Gatherer:BigPouch.NAME: Big Pouch
Gatherer:BigPouch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Gain Block equal to the total cost of your cards in hand.

Gatherer:Convert.NAME: Convert
Gatherer:Convert.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL If it is [#60B0C0]Uncommon,[] NL gain !B! Block. NL If it is [#FFC050]Rare,[] NL gain !M! Block.

Gatherer:EnergyBasket.NAME: Energy Basket
Gatherer:EnergyBasket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gatherer:Lesser Energy Potions. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:GatherMaterial.NAME: Gather Material
Gatherer:GatherMaterial.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random cards from your draw pile into your hand. Prioritizes cards not already in your hand.

Gatherer:Pollute.NAME: Pollute
Gatherer:Pollute.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, apply !M! Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.NAME: Quick Synthesis
Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:SaveValuables.NAME: Save Valuables
Gatherer:SaveValuables.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards from your discard pile. Shuffle them into your draw pile.

Gatherer:TreeGrowth.NAME: Tree Growth
Gatherer:TreeGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block 2 turns later.

Gatherer:WoolGloves.NAME: Wool Gloves
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL gatherer:Twice: Draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards.
NL gatherer:Once: Draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards.

Gatherer:Duality.NAME: Duality
Gatherer:Duality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain. When Retained, its tag switches between <ATK> and <DEF>.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain. When Retained, its tag switches between <ATK> and <DEF>.

Gatherer:EchoOfNature.NAME: Echo of Nature
Gatherer:EchoOfNature.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. Deal !D! Damage X times.

Gatherer:FlowerBeam.NAME: Flower Beam
Gatherer:FlowerBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the target, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Gatherer:FruitForce.NAME: Fruit Force
Gatherer:FruitForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! % of your Max HP. NL When obtained, raise your Max HP by 4.

Gatherer:MiningStrike.NAME: Mining Strike
Gatherer:MiningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. For every !M! unblocked damage, gain 1 Plated Armor.

Gatherer:Misfortune.NAME: Misfortune
Gatherer:Misfortune.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain up to !M! gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion with debuff effect that the enemy already has.
Gatherer:Misfortune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain up to !M! gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions with debuff effect that the enemy already has.

Gatherer:OddSpoils.NAME: Odd Spoils
Gatherer:OddSpoils.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! random card not in your deck to your discard pile. It costs 0 until played.
Gatherer:OddSpoils.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! random cards not in your deck to your discard pile. They cost 0 until played.

Gatherer:Polymorphism.NAME: Polymorphism
Gatherer:Polymorphism.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to number of other cards in your hand. If they are all gatherer:Unique, gain [E] and draw !M! card.
Gatherer:Polymorphism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to number of other cards in your hand. If they are all gatherer:Unique, gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

Gatherer:SealedBomb.NAME: Sealed Bomb
Gatherer:SealedBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. While in your hand, using a Potion decreases its cost by 1 this combat.

Gatherer:PotentialSlash.NAME: Potential Slash
Gatherer:PotentialSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! + half of your missing HP.

Gatherer:Duplicator.NAME: Duplicator
Gatherer:Duplicator.DESCRIPTION: Gain effects of all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:Duplicator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain effects of all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions.

Gatherer:Enchant.NAME: Enchant
Gatherer:Enchant.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Strike in your hand to give it Cost + 1, Damage + !M! and boosts special effect if it has.

Gatherer:GlowingPlant.NAME: Glowing Plant
Gatherer:GlowingPlant.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL When obtained, add a *Light! and a *Shadow! to your deck.

Gatherer:Light.NAME: Light!
Gatherer:Light.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Increase the damage of all *Shadow! in your hand by !M!.

Gatherer:Shadow.NAME: Shadow!
Gatherer:Shadow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Increase the Block of all *Light! in your hand by !M!.

Gatherer:Herbalism.NAME: Herbalism
Gatherer:Herbalism.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each card in your hand that costs 2 or more, to a maximum of 2 energy.
Gatherer:Herbalism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each card in your hand that costs 2 or more.

Gatherer:Nutrients.NAME: Nutrients
Gatherer:Nutrients.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When obtained, Upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards.

Gatherer:RecipeChange.NAME: Recipe Change
Gatherer:RecipeChange.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from ALL gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions. Replace all your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions with it. Exhaust.

Gatherer:RecoveryHerb.NAME: Recovery Herb
Gatherer:RecoveryHerb.DESCRIPTION: Considered as using a Potion. Heal !M! % of your missing HP. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:ScentOfRosmari.NAME: Scent of Rosmari
Gatherer:ScentOfRosmari.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Choose !M! cards to Retain. If they end up discarded, return them to your hand next turn.

Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.NAME: Scroll Of Wall
Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.
Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and give 1 Plated Armor.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.
Unplayable. Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and give 1 Plated Armor.

Gatherer:SmartManeuver.NAME: Smart Maneuver
Gatherer:SmartManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals half damage this turn. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Swift Potion.
Gatherer:SmartManeuver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals half damage this turn. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Swift Potion. NL Retain.

Gatherer:Solidify.NAME: Solidify
Gatherer:Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Repeat until your Sack is full: Spend !M! Block to gain a gatherer:Lesser Block Potion.

Gatherer:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
Gatherer:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card from your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Gatherer:Transmute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform a card from your hand. It is Upgraded and costs 0 this turn.

Gatherer:VenomBarrier.NAME: Venom Barrier
Gatherer:VenomBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

Gatherer:AlchemyTrial.NAME: Alchemy Trial
Gatherer:AlchemyTrial.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 10 cards, gain a gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion depending on the 10th card played.

Gatherer:BalancedGrowth.NAME: Balanced Growth
Gatherer:BalancedGrowth.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain up to !M! Strength or Dexterity until they are equal.

Gatherer:ColorfulGarden.NAME: Colorful Garden
Gatherer:ColorfulGarden.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block per gatherer:Unique card you played this turn.
Gatherer:ColorfulGarden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block per gatherer:Unique card you played this turn.

Gatherer:FeelingFine.NAME: Feeling Fine
Gatherer:FeelingFine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use 3 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.
Gatherer:FeelingFine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use 3 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.

Gatherer:Liquidism.NAME: Liquidism
Gatherer:Liquidism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.
Gatherer:Liquidism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.

Gatherer:UpgradeBag.NAME: Upgrade Bag
Gatherer:UpgradeBag.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Glitched in your draw pile. Your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions are 100% more potent.
Gatherer:UpgradeBag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Glitched+ in your discard pile. Your gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions are 100% more potent.

Gatherer:Glitched.NAME: Glitched
Gatherer:Glitched.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust. NL While in your hand, []Upgrade Bag's power is disabled.

Gatherer:Uplift.NAME: Uplift
Gatherer:Uplift.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, the first card you play that costs 2 or more has Refund 1.
Gatherer:Uplift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, the first !M! cards you play that cost 2 or more have Refund 1.

Gatherer:Bulldoze.NAME: Bulldoze
Gatherer:Bulldoze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for every !M! gatherer:Unique cards in your discard pile.

Gatherer:FinishingStrike.NAME: Finishing Strike
Gatherer:FinishingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has less HP than you, hit !M! times instead.

Gatherer:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL gatherer:Twice: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. When obtained, become [#FF6563]Cursed[] [#FF6563]-[] [#FF6563]Normality.[]
NL gatherer:Once: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. When obtained, become [#FF6563]Cursed[] [#FF6563]-[] [#FF6563]Normality.[]

Gatherer:FlamingBottle.NAME: Flaming Bottle
Gatherer:FlamingBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain a gatherer:Lesser Fire Potion.

Gatherer:HeartToFruit.NAME: Heart to Fruit
Gatherer:HeartToFruit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. Exhaust.

Gatherer:Photoscythe.NAME: Photoscythe
Gatherer:Photoscythe.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Upgrade ALL your gatherer:Flower cards for the combat. Deal damage equal to !M! X number of them. Exhaust.

Gatherer:BlackTea.NAME: Black Tea
Gatherer:BlackTea.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity. NL Startup: Gain a random gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potion.

Gatherer:Examine.NAME: Examine
Gatherer:Examine.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Play one and discard others.

Gatherer:GrowBook.NAME: Grow Book
Gatherer:GrowBook.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, or permanently replace this with 1 of 3 cards from other color. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:GrowBook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, or permanently replace this with 1 of 3 Upgraded cards from other color. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:MindSearch.NAME: Mind Search
Gatherer:MindSearch.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 out of 4 gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions to gain with the help of Gatherer's thought. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:MindSearch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 out of 4 gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions to gain with great help of Gatherer's thought. NL Retain. Exhaust.

Gatherer:Overflowing.NAME: Overflowing
Gatherer:Overflowing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Energy is conserved for the next turn. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.NAME: Scroll of Purity
Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you use a Potion, draw !M! card and Exhaust up to !M! card.
Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you use a Potion, draw !M! cards and Exhaust up to !M! cards.

Gatherer:BomberForm.NAME: Bomber Form
Gatherer:BomberForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a gatherer:LEP. All future gatherer:Lesser gatherer:Potions become gatherer:LEP and raise all gatherer:LEPs' damage by !M! when used.

Gatherer:FlowerPower.NAME: Flower Power
Gatherer:FlowerPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak and Frail. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
Gain !M! Weak. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.

Gatherer:StoneFence.NAME: Stone Fence
Gatherer:StoneFence.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 *Thrower to your hand.
Gatherer:StoneFence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 *Thrower+ to your hand.

Gatherer:Thrower.NAME: Thrower
Gatherer:Thrower.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal damage equal to the remaining Block at the start of this turn. Exhaust.
Gatherer:Thrower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal damage equal to the remaining Block at the start of this turn +2. Exhaust.

Gatherer:PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
Gatherer:PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Gain a gatherer:Lesser Poison Potion. NL Poison damage is increased by 100%.
Gatherer:PoisonMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain a gatherer:Lesser Poison Potion. NL Poison damage is increased by 100%.

Gatherer:AromaProtection.NAME: Aroma Protection
Gatherer:AromaProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Dazed into your discard pile.

Gatherer:LuckyClover.NAME: Lucky Clover
Gatherer:LuckyClover.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity for each gatherer:Flower cards in your deck.
Gatherer:LuckyClover.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity for each gatherer:Flower cards in your deck.

Gatherer:FlowerSuffix.NAME: FlowerSuffix
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Can be Upgraded 2 more times.
NL Can be Upgraded 1 more time.

Gatherer:DoNotReplaceOption.NAME: Do Not Replace
Gatherer:DoNotReplaceOption.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Do not replace Grow Book.
